name: Fazbear Horror
description:
This game is sorta like a remake of FNAF 1 with some cool extra stuff!

includes

-5 nights and an endless mode

-partial free roam

-voice acting in FNAF 1

-all characters from FNAF 1 and some more

- some easter eggs

ok I actually decided to upload this game onto itch.io but you can check out the original gamejolt page here Gamejolt page
